text:
[Verse]
Stars shine bright on us
Night whispers its secrets
Feet tap to the rhythm
Lost in this moment

[Verse 2]
Hands close around mine
Hearts beat in sync now
Moon soft on our faces
Twirl in the starlight

[Chorus]
Dance in the moonlight
Feel so right tonight
Dance till the morning
Feels like we're soaring

[Verse 3]
Glows from the city
Far off in the night haze
We're in our own world
Just you and me here

[Bridge]
Steps in perfect time
Our song's playing on
No words needed now
Love in every move

[Chorus]
Dance in the moonlight
Feel so right tonight
Dance till the morning
Feels like we're soaring
title: Moonlit Dance
